value:
My brother is nobody's fool. But when
it comes to Ephraim...well, that's the
exception. He sees him as a rival.

I left the castle without my father's
permission. I wonder if he'll be angry
with me...

How are you doing? Just let me know
if you need something. That's what
friends are for, right?

Come on! Let's get out of here! Show
me a good time. After all, taking time
out is important—even in war.$k$pIf you don't relax now and again, you'll
suffer for it.

Outside of training? I spend my time
making friends, I suppose...$k$pI just want to meet people who have
the same aspirations I do!

Hello, $Nu!$k$pThank you for being such a good
friend to $Nf!

My brother will have no choice
but to acknowledge my skill now!

I wish we could be more like
Eirika and Ephraim. Maybe now...

I can just imagine what my
brother would say about this...

I can hold my head high and fight
alongside everyone! Thank you!

My name is Tana, and I'm a pegasus
knight.$k$pOh, and I'm also the princess of
Frelia. I hope you won't let that get
in the way of us being friends, though!

I had seen so little of the world. But
somehow, when I left the castle, I
thought I was ready...$k$pBut no. Coming here has simply
shown me that there is so much that
I don't yet understand.$k$pTraveling with you has opened my
eyes, though. I am sure of it.$k$pEirika is my best friend. Of that, I have
no doubt. But you've become just
as important to me.$k$pI love Eirika, Ephraim, and my brother
with all of my heart. And I feel the
same about you!
えーいっ！
もうっ！
きゃああっ！
けだもの…
I will help!
This is awful.
You beast!
I am a knight of Frelia!
I've long been prepared...
Heehee
Shall we chat? Yes? Lovely!
Aah! Please don't tease me like that.
My brother is so cruel. You should hear what he said to me.
I'm afraid I haven't been very much help to you.
I feel I should apologize. I'm still in training and not quite battle-ready.
Am I a little bit stronger now? I hope so...
Thank you—truly, thank you—for making an effort to understand how I feel.
Yes?
Tell me.
All right.
